summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue local improvement bonds for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from Atlantic Street to Broad Street, et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, under Ordinance No. 13900, creating Local Improvement District No. 1264 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement; repealing Ordinance No. 15472, approved February 23, 1907, and authorizing the cancellation of bonds in said district issued under authority of said Ordinance No. 15472.
